channel.title: Database on DevRa
channel.description: Recent content in Database on DevRa

item.title: Postgres Management with the CLI
item.description: PostgreSQL is an object-relational database management system (ORDBMS). It is widely used as an enterprise database management system. In this article I will show you what commands I use on the postgres CLI to install, manage and run the database for my projects

item.title: How to Connect Django to an Existing Legacy Database
item.description:
Do you need to connect a django project with an exiting database that already contains data? In this tutorial we will learn how to connect an existing MySQL database to a django project.

Get an existing database

If you don’t have an existing database to play with, you can get one at mysqltutorial.org
